questions.question: What was Octavian granted on account of his military successes?
What honours was Octavian given on his return to Rome?
options: Tribunician sacrosanctity and a golden statue in the forum with an inscription about
A temple dedicated in his name

questions.question: Where did Antony set off in expedition to in 37?
What was the outcome of Antony's expedition in 37?
What did Octavia ask that she be allowed to do?
What was Antony's response to his wife?
options: He dismissed her when she arrived
He refused to see her but sent gifts

questions.question: What territory did Antony annex in 34?
What did Antony do on his return to Alexandria?
What were the Donations of Alexandria, in 34?
options: Antony divided Egypt among Roman senators
Cleopatra was made ruler of all the East
Antony declared Caesarion as Caesar's heir and King of Kings; Cleopatra as Queen

questions.question: What did Agrippa do in Rome, during his 33 BC aedileship?
options: Launched a huge public works programme

questions.question: What role was Maecenas playing in Rome?
options: Distributing Octavian's views and values through art, particularly poetry
